meanings.definition: The part of a tree trunk beneath the ground.
meanings.sent1: The roots of the tree spread deep into the subgums for stability.
meanings.sent2: Gardening experts study the subgums to understand how trees grow.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel dug into the subgums looking for hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the forest are whispered among the silent subgums.
meanings.sent5: In the darkness of the soil, the subgums hold the tree's secrets.

meanings.definition: A type of Chinese dish made with mixed vegetables and meat.
meanings.sent1: The aroma of the delicious subgums filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: At the restaurant, the chef prepared a special subgums dish.
meanings.sent3: The subgums on the menu always make my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The flavors of the subgums danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The colorful subgums dish was a feast for the eyes before the stomach.
